individual_metadata.synopsis: A goblin preparing for a raid, at a distance from the party going on elsewhere in the camp. He's trying to keep his head down, getting on with his work.

automatic_ordering.reasoning: Only a single session (with an empty name) is provided. Without additional sessions to compare, there are no cases where one session's occurrence depends on or contradicts another. Thus, no ordering or exclusiveness constraints can be deduced.

0.speaker: Brawler Gurd
0.context: NodeContext: "gotta stick to my work" delivered deferentially, 'bugger off' dismissive

1.speaker: Brawler Gurd
1.text: This ain't the party, pal. We're workin' here.
1.context: NodeContext: Dismissive, unless speaking to a drow on the "wiv that other drow" line, in which case deferential and trying to look busier than he is like a worker when the boss walks into the room.
